description:
Impeccably presented with sleek contemporary design, this one bedroom inner-city pad offers a generous 95 sqm of living, including a balcony with elevated urban outlook.

The apartment exudes a welcoming ambience thanks to abundant natural light filtering throughout, quality inclusions and an ideal open plan layout providing superb living/dining spaces, impressive kitchen plus a designated study nook.

The master bedroom is spacious, exceptionally quiet and boasts a walk-through robe with practical two-way ensuite bathroom. Reverse cycle air conditioning features throughout and a stylish white and grey aesthetic creates enduring appeal.

Perfect for busy professionals or those wanting a supremely convenient city base, the apartment resides in Spring Hills popular Oxygen complex.

Residents can enjoy resort-inspired facilities, including landscaped gardens and two swimming pools.

- Living, dining & kitchen opens to great size balcony & views
- Open plan kitchen design, modern appliances & dishwasher
- Quality carpet, two r/c air con systems
- Concealed laundry facilities, security car space & intercom
- Level lift access, village green, lap pool, spa, sauna & gym
- Metres from Spring Hills many restaurants & bar scene
- Easy 5 minute walk to Queen St Mall & Riverside Centre
- Spring Hill Loop bus service nearby
- Close to Brisbane's top schools and hospitals

For more information, please contact Kevin Do on 0422 178 338 or Jacob Pearson on 0419 507 522 before it is sold.

We have in preparing this advertisement used our best endeavours to ensure the information contained is true and accurate, but accept no responsibility and disclaim all liability in respect to any errors, omissions, inaccuracies or misstatements contained. Prospective purchasers should make their own enquiries to verify the information contained in this advertisement.

* Photos of a similar apartment.
